head.title: function-whitelist
head.description: function-whitelist Specify a whitelist of allowed functions Options array|string: \["array", "of", "unprefixed", "functions" or "regex…

body:
#function-whitelist

Specify a whitelist of allowed functions

a { transform: scale(1); }
/**            ↑
 * These functions */

#Options

array|string: ["array", "of", "unprefixed", "functions" or "regex"]|"function"|"/regex/"

If a string is surrounded with "/" (e.g. "/^rgb/"), it is interpreted as a regular expression.

Given:

["scale", "rgba", "linear-gradient"]

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { transform: rotate(1); }
a {
  color: hsla(170, 50%, 45%, 1)
}
a {
  background:
    red,
    -webkit-radial-gradient(red, green, blue);
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { background: red; }
a { transform: scale(1); }
a {
  color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}
a {
  background:
    red,
    -moz-linear-gradient(45deg, blue, red);
}
